zoneTypes.name: Heartland Plains
zoneTypes.description: Starter-friendly farmlands and gentle hills. Reliable staples and safe routes; faction control is common and conflict is about logistics rather than rarity.
zoneTypes.notes: High baseline economy; low access to high-tier ore and magic reagents.

zoneTypes.name: Ancient Forest
zoneTypes.description: Dense woodland with rare flora and resinous trees. Great for woods, hides, and alchemical reagents; limited stone and ore veins.
zoneTypes.notes: Balanced value through mixed trade goods rather than raw metal.

zoneTypes.name: Highland Mountains
zoneTypes.description: Rocky passes and mining settlements. High ore and stone output with gem pockets; food and water are scarce so supply lines matter.
zoneTypes.notes: Economic value is metal-heavy; vulnerable to food/water disruption.

zoneTypes.name: Crystal Caves
zoneTypes.description: Subterranean rifts infused with arcane energy. Produces enchanting reagents and mana crystals; contested because it upgrades everything.
zoneTypes.notes: Low staple output; high premium reagents offset scarcity.

zoneTypes.name: Swamp Mire
zoneTypes.description: Wetlands full of rare herbs, peat, and murky waterways. Strong for alchemy and cooking inputs; movement is slower and visibility is poor.
zoneTypes.notes: Value comes from reagents; avoid relying on metal production here.

zoneTypes.name: Riverlands
zoneTypes.description: Fertile deltas and river trade routes. Excellent water access and mixed staple production; good for early trade and worker camp networks.
zoneTypes.notes: Balanced zone with steady income; few premium minerals.

zoneTypes.name: Desert Badlands
zoneTypes.description: Arid dunes and rugged badlands. Salt and chemical reagents are abundant; water scarcity creates natural conflict and caravan gameplay.
zoneTypes.notes: High value via scarcity-trade goods; low wood and water.

zoneTypes.name: Tundra Frostwild
zoneTypes.description: Frozen plains with hardy beasts and mineral seams. Strong hides and pristine water; staple crops are limited so supply must be planned.
zoneTypes.notes: Value is split between defense materials and industry inputs.

zoneTypes.name: Volcanic Wastes
zoneTypes.description: Ash fields and lava flows. Provides obsidian, high-grade ore, and volatile reagents used for endgame crafting and engineering.
zoneTypes.notes: Premium output compensates for near-zero food/water.

zoneTypes.name: Coastal Isles
zoneTypes.description: Island chains with fisheries, salt flats, and trade ports. Great for fish, salt, and specialty fibers; limited heavy stone production.
zoneTypes.notes: Trade-focused zone; ideal for feeding armies and funding upgrades.
